name: Buying skills
description: In order to buy skills, you need skill points. You can see your skill points above your inventory. In order to get skill points, you must fill the blue bar with a up arrow that is above your hunger. You can fill this bar up by killing monsters and mining blocks. Once the bar fills up you get 1 skill point. Once you have enough skill points, Open the menu with Load Hotbar Activator to buy a skill. §f§lNOTE§r: Skills will only show up in the menu if you have §f§lenough skill points.§r
